task.title: Creating a Certificate Store
task.shortdesc: certapp helps you create certificate stores. The following is an example for creating a certificate store.

step.cmd: Create a configuration file, certclients.txt, which maps application name text strings to application UIDs.
step.info: Make sure that only one application name maps to a UID.
Note: Although no error is displayed when you map more than one application name to a UID, this is not recommended.
The following is an example of a configuration file:

stepxmp.codeblock: StartClientInfo # Entry 1 Uid 0x100042ab Name "SW Install" # Entry 2 Uid 0x1000a8b6 Name "SW Install OCSP Signing" EndClientInfo
